EmailTemplate.name: 202003_BK_Webinar_SocialFlight_Automation_and_the_Flight_Envelope_MC.30 Day Foll
EmailTemplate.subject: Automation and the Flight Envelope
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Need more information?
Thank you for your interest in viewing our recent on-demand webinar “Automation and the Flight Envelope” from March 26, 2020.
In case you wanted to watch this on-demand, here’s the link and access code: Link: Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Automation_and_the_Flight_Envelope.html]]> Access code: 850409
We’d like to provide more information regarding the AeroCruze autopilot equipment mentioned in the webinar:
- AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]> autopilot - AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]> autopilot - Find a dealer <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/Dealer-Directory/]]> in your area - Schedule a demo <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com?subject=Talk%20to%20me%20about%20ADS-B%20equipment]]> of our available products for your aircraft with our sales team
For other BendixKing products, check out our video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xPBRd-8jn04]]> walk-through of our Cessna 182, which has the full AeroVue Touch flight deck <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/~/media/bendixking/files/3122-bk-aerovue-ifd-owner-version.pdf]]>! Please contact <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/contact-us]]> us with any questions.
